author: yongjiexin3
body:
These codes are for implementing the PFCaloJets and PFClusterJets. 
Test file is located here :  RecoJets/JetProducers/test/PFClusterJets_PFCaloJets_producer.py
To run it :  cmsRun PFClusterJets_PFCaloJets_producer.py

The twiki page describing these procedure and also the results are here: 
https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/JMARPFCaloJetAndPFClusterJets

The most recent presentation about this is located here. 
https://indico.cern.ch/event/364109/contribution/3/material/slides/0.pdf
title: PFCaloJet and PFClusterJet
